column4: G'day everyone. I'm on Windows XP x64 right now and I'm looking to install Ubuntu. What's my best option for a free disk partitioning software?
Ubuntu has disk partitioning software on the CD

You're gonna wanna use the "manual partitioning" method when you're installing, if it's still there. I haven't played with Gutsy's installer.. things might've changed. If it's not there, Go to System > Administration > and there should be partitioning software in there
